description: A CSS file defining styles and themes for a React application with light and dark theme support.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application container style with responsive design elements.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header style for the application including layout and background color.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Style for links within the application, including color transitions.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Style for the button that toggles between light and dark themes.
